Community

LinkedEarth Community

The LinkedEarth community brings together researchers, data scientists, and paleoclimate experts from around the world.

Core Team

Julien Emile-Geay
Department of Earth Sciences, University of Southern California

Climate dynamics, data analysis, open science

Deborah Khider
Information Sciences Institute, University of Southern California

Paleoclimatology, data science, AI, open science

Nick McKay
School of Earth and Sustainability, Northern Arizona University

Paleoclimatology, data analysis, informatics, age modeling

Collectives

LinkedEarth collaborates with several working groups and initiatives:

  • PAGES2k - Past Global Changes 2k Network
  • Iso2k - Isotopes 2k Network
  • CoralHydro2k - Coral Hydro 2k Network
  • Temp12k - Temperature 12k Database
  • PALMOD - Data Compilation supporting the PalMod project

Participate

Please join our Discourse forum to ask questions and get support on all things LinkedEarth. You can also email us to get added to the LinkedEarth Community Slack workspace.

If you wish to report bugs or suggest enhancements to our software, please open an issue on GitHub; for instance, here for Pyleoclim.
